name: Baldi in ultimate crossover (Baldi basic custom game)
name_original: Baldi in ultimate crossover (Baldi basic custom game)
description:
Welcome to Baldi in ultimate crossover. The place where Baldi and all his friends along with some new friends live and sometimes wants to have some fun with the visitors. Now go and have fun with them. What could possibly go wrong?

Credits:

Paulor94 - Game creator

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

The Stupendium - The owner of the main menu music
